overview: James doesn't know how to tell his little sister, Jessica that their father has passed away during her vacation and to put her at ease, he writes a postcard to Jessica and pretends it's from their father. The effects of this causes tension between James and his mother, Tina, who has been reluctant to tell Jessica the truth for so long.
tagline: What hurts more than a lie ... is the truth.
title: Postcard from the Island
